:::Ramjet:::

Ramjet: Don't mind at all, the more the merrier!
::He nods::
Ramjet: yes, we do have a base.  It's in the area which will someday be 
called Syria.  Would you like to see it?

--part1_a8.1404b527.280cae1b_boundary
